entry.title: Personalized Custom Photo Wedding Puzzle with 150 pieces 20x30 inches
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding
Price: 79.99 - 94.99 (4 variants)

Do you love personalized puzzles?  Personalized Puzzles are a great way to relax and enjoy the company of friends and family. They’re also an amazing gift for any occasion!  Our Personalized Custom Photo Puzzle with 150 pieces is a Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle.  Featuring very vibrant colors on a thick board and printed in a professional matte finish, this puzzle is absolutely stunning.
Each piece in this Poster Size puzzle will measure approximately 2 x 2 inches, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches! For ease of assembly, we'll even hand-number the back of the puzzle for a nominal fee.

This personalized photo puzzle makes an excellent wedding guest book or anniversary gift that can be enjoyed by all ages from 6 to 106! It's perfect for those who want something different than traditional guest books and provides fun for your guests.  You can read the personalized messages on each piece before assembling it into one large picture - so every time you put it together you'll see your guest's special words of love and encouragement.  Better yet, why not frame it and hang it where all can see, as this elegant puzzle should fit into a standard size frame.

Ordering has never been easier – just upload your favorite Engagement Photo and click “Add To Cart”.  We offer many payment options including the option to split your payment into 4 easy interest-free payments with Zazzle.

entry.title: 200 Piece Custom Photo Jigsaw Wedding Guest Book Puzzle - Poster Size Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 82.99 - 97.99 (4 variants)

Unique personalized picture puzzle for Wedding Guest Book for large weddings.

Our Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle is absolutely HUGE and features 200 large pieces for your guests to sign.   Gather your engagement photos and turn one into a custom photo puzzle guestbook.  Your guests will love the fun of interacting with your Guest Book Puzzle and will always be a piece of your big day.

A fantastic buy, this Personalized Wedding Guest Book Puzzle encourages your guests to interact with each other while leaving you a lifetime memory on a puzzle piece.  Never put your guestbook in the closet again, instead frame it and display it for everyone to see.

SIZE: Each piece will measure approximately 2 x 1.5 inches when complete, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches, making this an easy to frame standard-size puzzle! 

BEST RESULTS: This is a Poster Size Puzzle so please be sure to send us a high-resolution photo for best results. If purchasing a photo from your photographer, be sure to mention that you will be enlarging the photo to approximately 20 x 30 inches. We print what you send, so be sure to send a print-ready photo.

RECOMMENDATION: We recommend having your photo hand-numbered if it is similarly colored or patterned, as our pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but are not exact.  We can hand-number the back of your puzzle in pencil so that they can be easily erased after assembly.  

We recommend using a medium-point ballpoint pen to write on the back of the puzzle pieces.  Please be sure to have a few handy for your guests!

If you are having a smaller wedding and you need fewer pieces we have you covered!  Click THIS LINK to go to our 16x20 inch puzzles.

entry.title: Missing Piece for White Puzzle. Replacement Piece for White Jigsaw Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 3.25 - 4.99 (8 variants)

Are you missing a piece for your white puzzle?  At times, a guest may not properly read the signs that you have placed near your beautiful guest book and may wander away with one.  We ALWAYS recommend that you have your puzzle numbered, especially in the case of a missing piece. 

We can recreate MOST white puzzle pieces within the first few months of use.  

WE CANNOT GUARANTY THAT IT WILL FIT.

What we need to recreate a piece:

  1. We will need a photo of the assembled puzzle from the front AND backside.
  2. The number of the piece
  3. The finished size of the puzzle
  4. Please purchase one item per missing piece
  5. Limit of 3 pieces per order

Each piece must be individually crafted, so please be patient in your request.  Again, WE CANNOT GUARANTEE 100% fit with the pieces but will do the very best that we can as experts in puzzle making!  Depending on the age and time that your puzzle was completed you may need to hand cut the piece yourself, but we can send the materials.  Please let us know if this is your option.

We will provide a piece that matches your numbered backing but we can never guarantee that it will fit, as we regularly change out our dies to keep them fresh and sharp.  While we will do the best to accommodate your request, the replacement piece may not be an exact match depending on the age of your puzzle and other factors.

s:variant.title: Materials to Cut Your Own Piece

entry.title: Blank White Puzzle for a Unique Wedding Guest Book - 80 Puzzle Pieces (approx. 16 x 20)
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Guest Book
Price: 29.99 - 34.99 (2 variants)

Blank White Puzzle Pieces come together to form the Perfect Wedding Guest Book or Guest Book for any special occasion. This extra-large bright white puzzle is approximately 16 x 20 inches when complete.  This elegant puzzle will fit wonderfully into a standard American Sized frame, as they are proudly MADE IN AMERICA.

Our 80 extra-large pieces are thick, sturdy, and durable, and feature a brilliant bright white covering that will provide enough room for your special guests to leave a very brief message and signature.  Our 80 piece puzzle features pieces that are an average size of 2 x 2 inches each and have a large surface area.  We hand-number each puzzle on the back as they are very challenging to assemble.

WRITING ON YOUR PUZZLE:  There are no special pens needed to sign our puzzles and we highly recommend using a regular ballpoint pen. Sharpies will also look amazing on the white puzzle pieces, and we recommend using the Sharpies with the larger tip.  Gel pens are not recommended.

A wonderful Unique Guest Book Puzzle for every occasion. Perfect for Baby Showers, Quincierna's, Bar & Bat Mitzvahs' and Sweet 16 parties!  Our puzzles are all Made In America with quality standards in mind and are easily framed because of their standard sizes.

Our 104 piece guest book puzzle has an average piece size of 1.5 x 2 inches.  We do not stock this puzzle without numbering, as they are very challenging to assemble and will automatically hand-number the back of each puzzle.

WRITING ON THE PUZZLE:  There are no special pens needed to sign our puzzles and we highly recommend using a regular ballpoint pen. Sharpies look amazing on the white puzzle pieces, but please stay away from using anything with an ultra-fine or fine point, as these do not work well on puzzle pieces.  Gel pens are not recommended.

Our puzzles are all Made In America with quality standards in mind and are easily framed because of their standard sizes. A wonderful Unique Guest Book Puzzle for every occasion. Perfect for Weddings, Parties, Quincierna's, Bar & Bat Mitzvahs' and Sweet 16 parties!

entry.title: Perfect Personalized Grandparent Gift Idea. Custom Photo Puzzle with 320 XL Pieces.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 46.99 - 51.99 (2 variants)

We offer the perfect personalized photo puzzle gift for carefree Seniors, Grandparents, and even your In-Laws.  This 320 piece personalized puzzle features your most cherished memory of family history and is Made In America.  

This puzzle features Large Puzzle Pieces that are manageable for all hands while showing nice detail in the photo.  Each puzzle piece measures approximately 1 x 1 inch each, making them a little larger than the standard puzzle.  

Great for people who are visually impaired or need a little more to grasp onto.  With over three hundred pieces, this custom puzzle will keep you busy and is recommended for the expert puzzler, as it is similarly shaped and sized, but not exact!  A fan favorite, this sturdy and thick custom puzzle has been given as a Personalized Grandparent's gift idea, teacher gifts, and has unlimited uses.  Why not frame it for a great family portrait puzzle?

*It's important to note that our 320 piece puzzle is recommended for the expert puzzler.  This large custom puzzle features pieces that are similarly shaped, sized, and cut that present an additional challenge to even an expert who has puzzled for years.  It is recommended that your photos for this puzzle have a variety of colors and patterns.  Similarly colored/patterned photos should be avoided and high-resolution images are suggested.  Check out our blog post on Choosing A Photograph.
